channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Debates
channel.description:
I believe general debates should be a child board of intellectual debates.
Why? Think about it like "tutorials and snippets" Snippets used to just have a sticky, now it has a child board it's very similar.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Debates
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:3, topic:518692”]It does the forum no harm having it as a normal board, does it?[/quote]No it doesn’t I was just reading somebodies post a while back somewhere and I thought about it. :rolleyes:

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Debates
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

I like having them as two separate sections. It makes it much clearer to people (even if they ignore it) that one section if for basic debates while the other is intended only for those debates/discussions that are intellectual.

Read full topic
